author: Nicb1, KillerKiwiJuice, MgMetal13, Crembels, zx0, MikeyH, Alpha2546, PRoeleert, wondible, Quitch, Stuart98, dom314, Elodea, Graushwein, CptConundrum
description: Adds an entirely new faction with over a hundred units for use in skirmish and multiplayer without modifying the original faction. Requires TITANS. If you don't like the red theme it can be disabled in Settings.
